results.name: Sababa 沙巴巴中東美食
results.location: 台北市羅斯福路三段 283 巷 17 號
results.location_en: No. 17, Lane 283, Section 3, Roosevelt Road, Taipei City
results.description: 沙巴巴批塔是台灣第一家純手工批塔專賣店,只選用最新鮮的頂級原料,以及道地的中東家傳配方。
results.description_en: Sababa Pita is the first pure handmade Pita specialty store in Taiwan, using only the freshest top-quality ingredients and authentic Middle Eastern recipes

results.name: 梅子鰻蒲燒專賣店
results.location: 台北市中山區林森北路 107 巷 8 號
results.location_en: No. 8, Lane 107, Linsen North Road, Zhongshan District, Taipei City

results.name: ZIGA ZIGA
results.location: 台北市信義區松壽路 2 號
results.location_en: No. 2, Songshou Road, Xinyi District, Taipei City
results.description: 以頂級食材與料理技法完美呈現各類經典義式料理，獅頭造型烤爐現作pizza與開放式廚房現作龍蝦茄汁雞蛋銀絲麵是不可錯過的必嚐推薦！夜間國際級樂團的熱力演出，感受活力四射的現場魅力。
results.description_en: It perfectly presents all kinds of classic Italian dishes with top-quality ingredients and cooking techniques. The pizza made in the lion head oven and the noodles with lobster, tomato sauce, egg and silver wire made in the open kitchen are not to be missed! Enjoy the lively performance of international orchestras at night and feel the lively charm

results.name: 艾朋牛排餐酒館
results.location: 110 台北市信義區忠孝東路五段 139 號 2 樓
results.location_en: 2F, No. 139, Section 5, Zhongxiao East Road, Xinyi District, Taipei City 110
results.description: 從味蕾開始，重拾美味感動。艾朋牛排餐酒館對高級料理的細選珍饌堅持，更勇於翻脫新意，要以平易親人的親切風格，同時不失料理獨家精髓，成功打動每吋挑剔味蕾，讓每位顧客享用鮮嫩Steak牛排風采，咀嚼Pasta義大利麵層次風味！
results.description_en: Start from the taste buds and regain the delicious touch. Ai Peng Steak Restaurant insists on the fine selection of high-end cuisine, and is more courageous to turn over new ideas. It must use a friendly and family-friendly style without losing the exclusive essence of cooking, successfully impressing every discerning taste bud, and allowing every customer to enjoy fresh and tender Steak Steak style, chew pasta pasta layered flavor!

results.name: Gusto Pizza
results.location: 北市中正區連雲街 74 號
results.location_en: No. 74, Lianyun Street, Zhongzheng District, Beishi
results.description: 我們的披薩師傅從倫敦帶來別於一般口味的經典義大利披薩，而且披薩麵團至少發酵24小時。同時我們也窯烤麵包及甜點，但披薩才是GUSTO最強項。我們製做的每一份餐點，都充滿飽飽的口味及香氣。除此之外，遵循純手工及傳統方式製作是我們的堅持。
results.description_en: Our pizza chefs bring classic Italian pizza from London with a different taste, and the pizza dough rises for at least 24 hours. At the same time we also kiln bake bread and desserts, but pizza is GUSTO's strongest point. Every meal we make is full of flavours and aromas. Besides, it is our insistence to follow pure handmade and traditional production methods.

results.name: WXYZ Bar
results.location_en: Shuangcheng Street, Zhongshan District, Taipei City
results.description: 紅酒吧，現代創意料理，開胃小館。提供純素選擇，提供無麩質選擇，提供素食選擇。
results.description_en: Wine bar, modern creative cuisine, appetizer bistro. Vegan options available, gluten-free options available, vegetarian options available.

results.name: Fika Fika Cafe
results.location: 台北市中山區伊通街 33 號
results.location_en: No. 33, Yitong Street, Zhongshan District, Taipei City
results.description: 我們在乎每一位顧客、賣出去的每一滴咖啡、每一粒咖啡豆。而今，「Fika Fika Cafe Online Store」更期望把如此美好的體驗，分享給喜歡我們的每一位顧客，希望您無論在世界的哪一個角落，都能與我們一起享受「Fika Fika」的美好時光。
results.description_en: We care about every customer, every drop of coffee, every coffee bean sold. Today, 'Fika Fika Cafe Online Store' hopes to share such a wonderful experience with every customer who likes us. I hope you can enjoy the wonderful time of 'Fika Fika' with us no matter where you are in the world.

results.name: 布娜飛比利時啤酒餐廳
results.location: 台北市松山區市民大道四段 185 號
results.location_en: No. 185, Section 4, Civic Avenue, Songshan District, Taipei City
results.description: 我們希望帶給您的，不只是啤酒，有美食，還有一份對生活的熱情。 義大利語「Bravo」的原意─「喝采」、「讚揚」， 我想著如果有一個大家都能輕鬆品嚐美酒、享受美食的地方，那就真的是太棒了！ 因為這個念頭，加上一股對比利時啤酒的熱情， 於是「Bravo Beer布娜飛比利時啤酒餐廳」在2006年誕生了...
results.description_en: We hope to bring you not only beer, but also food and a passion for life. The original meaning of the Italian word 'Bravo' - 'applause', 'praise', I thought that if there is a place where everyone can easily taste good wine and enjoy food, it would be really great! Because of this idea and a passion for Belgian beer, 'Bravo Beer Belgian Beer Restaurant' was born in 2006...
